attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we already pay VAT on fuel the government should scrap fuel duty. With a lot of people on higher wages the government should be able to afford to scrap it as more of us are in work. To balance the cost of losing fuel duty reduce state handouts!
